revised_title: Analyzing the Constitution of Prussic, Ferruretted Chyazic, and Sulphuretted Chyazic Acids and Their Salts
tldr: The author investigates the composition and properties of prussic, ferruretted chyazic, and sulphuretted chyazic acids, as well as their salts, using analytical methods and the atomic theory. The study focuses on the decomposition of prussic acid and the analysis of its components, including carbon, azote, and hydrogen.
